plan_md_requirements.requirement: Include a "Subtasks" section listing Subtask 1..10 with one-sentence scopes.
Include a "Best Practices (Context7)" section with bullet points and links/snippets.
Include an "Append-Only Log" section where each subtask result is appended.

must_include.item: Whether the original user demand was fully met (yes/no/partial) and why.
Offline behavior impact: preserved / at risk / broken (and evidence).
List of all files created/edited/deleted across all subtasks (aggregate).
Any unintended changes: what changed, where, why it likely happened, how to revert.
Known issues not solved: root cause hypotheses and next steps.
